a, b, c, d = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b, d) - max(a, c))


import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    A, B, C = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    print(min(B // A, C)) 
a, b, c = map(int, input().split())
print(min(b // a, c))

import sys

if __name__ == '__main__':
    N, A, B = map(int, sys.stdin.readline().rstrip().split())
    print(min(N * A, B))
